name: b1g-website
description: B1G Corporation Website - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run fix-permissions && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Backend && npm install && cd ../Frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd Backend && rm -rf dist && cd ../Frontend && rm -rf dist
scripts.vercel-build: npm run fix-permissions && npm run build

author: B1G Corporation
